price: 45. Markaasuu Alle ka dhowray xumaha waxay qooleen, oo cadaab tan u daran waxay ku degtay reer Fircoon.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhu al-lahu sayyiāti mā makarū waḥāqa biāli fir'ʿawna sūu al-ʿadhābi
